author: Bret Baier, Gillian Turner, Adam Shaw
title: US officials confirm full-scale investigation of whether coronavirus escaped from Wuhan lab
description: The U.S. is conducting a full-scale investigation into whether the novel coronavirus, which went on to morph into a global pandemic that has brought the global economy to its knees, escaped from a lab in Wuhan China, Fox News has learned.
content:
